# equal

**Instance Property**

The callback used to compare values in the array for equality for some operations. If `NULL`, the collection will use pointer equality to compare values in the collection. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFArrayEqualCallBack] for a description of this callback.

## Declaration

```swift
var equal: CFArrayEqualCallBack!
```
title: equal
